title: Oh ramaa ramaNa
sahitya:
O ramAramaNa rAma rAma nE nOrvajAla raghurAma



caraNam 1



 sArasAkSa manasAra nammitini cErarA nI upacAra mAyega

   

caraNam 2



 angalArpu gani pongagAni shrIranga nI madi karaganga lEdurA

   

caraNam 3



 ninnu nammi nE khinnuDaiti Apannu narulakE munna diddharini

   

caraNam 4



 cuTTi cuTTi nA guTTu nangadani beTTa jEsi ceyibeTTa kuNTivi

   

caraNam 5



 dhIruDanucu ninu gOrukunna nIvArali vyasana vAridhi nIdIra

   

caraNam 6



 mETiyau paluku bOTi patiki EnATi krOdhamO tOTivAralalO

   

caraNam 7



 mAna rakSaka purANa sajjana nidAnuDanucu ninu dAna mADigitini

   

caraNam 8



 kAna nIku sari gAnalOla ika gAna rAru peddAna beTTudunu

   

caraNam 9



 yOga siddhulaku E gati anucu vEga tOcadA tyAgarAjanuta
